alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN DAWSON COUNTY THROUGH 330 PM CDT... At 247 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Cozad, or 12 miles west of Lexington, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cozad around 250 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 231. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
